query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Intra due cibi, distanti e moventi 2 d’un modo, prima si morria di fame, 3 che liber’ omo l’un recasse ai denti;
query.error: **English:** 1 Between two foods, distant and moving 2 in the same way, one would die of hunger first, 3 before a free man would bring one of them to his teeth;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 sì si starebbe un agno intra due brame 5 di fieri lupi, igualmente temendo; 6 sì si starebbe un cane intra due dame:
query.error: **English:** 4 thus one would stand for a year between two cravings 5 of fierce wolves, fearing them equally; 6 thus one would stand, a dog between two does:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 per che, s’i’ mi tacea, me non riprendo, 8 da li miei dubbi d’un modo sospinto, 9 poi ch’era necessario, né commendo.
query.error: **English:** 7 because, if I kept silent, I would not blame myself, 8 driven in one direction by my doubts, 9 since it was necessary, nor do I praise myself.
query.result: 7 karena, jika aku diam, aku tidak akan menyalahkan diriku sendiri, 8 didorong ke satu arah oleh keraguanku, 9 karena itu perlu, aku juga tidak memuji diriku sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Io mi tacea, ma ’l mio disir dipinto 11 m’era nel viso, e ’l dimandar con ello, 12 più caldo assai che per parlar distinto.
query.error: **English:** 10 I was silent, but my desire was painted 11 on my face, and he asked me with it, 12 more fervently than by distinct speech.
query.result: 10 Aku terdiam, tetapi hasratku terlukis 11 di wajahku, dan dia bertanya kepadaku dengan itu, 12 lebih bersemangat daripada berbicara dengan jelas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Fé sì Beatrice qual fé Danïello, 14 Nabuccodonosor levando d’ira, 15 che l’avea fatto ingiustamente fello;
query.error: **English:** 13 Beatrice did as Daniel did, 14 making Nebuchadnezzar furious, 15 who had unjustly made him angry;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 e disse: «Io veggio ben come ti tira 17 uno e altro disio, sì che tua cura 18 sé stessa lega sì che fuor non spira.
query.error: **English:** 16 and she said: "I see well how you are pulled 17 by one desire and another, so that your concern 18 binds itself so that it does not breathe out.
query.result: 16 dan dia berkata: "Aku melihat dengan baik bagaimana kamu ditarik 17 oleh satu dan keinginan lainnya, sehingga perhatianmu 18 mengikat dirinya sendiri sehingga tidak bernafas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Tu argomenti: “Se ’l buon voler dura, 20 la vïolenza altrui per qual ragione 21 di meritar mi scema la misura?”.
query.error: **English:** 19 You argue: “If good will endures, 20 why should the violence of others 21 diminish the measure of my merit?”.
query.result: 19 Kamu berpendapat: “Jika niat baik bertahan, 20 mengapa kekerasan orang lain 21 mengurangi ukuran pahalaku?”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Ancor di dubitar ti dà cagione 23 parer tornarsi l’anime a le stelle, 24 secondo la sentenza di Platone.
query.error: **English:** 22 Even to doubt gives you cause 23 to think that souls return to the stars, 24 according to Plato's judgment.
query.result: 22 Bahkan untuk meragukan memberi Anda alasan 23 untuk berpikir bahwa jiwa-jiwa kembali ke bintang-bintang, 24 menurut penilaian Plato.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Queste son le question che nel tuo velle 26 pontano igualmente; e però pria 27 tratterò quella che più ha di felle.
query.error: **English:** 25 These are the questions that in your will 26 point equally; and therefore first 27 I will treat the one that has more gall.
query.result: 25 Inilah pertanyaan-pertanyaan yang dalam keinginanmu 26 sama-sama penting; dan karena itu pertama-tama 27 akan kubahas yang paling pahit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 D’i Serafin colui che più s’india, 29 Moïsè, Samuel, e quel Giovanni 30 che prender vuoli, io dico, non Maria,
query.error: **English:** 28 Of the Seraphim, the one who soars highest, 29 Moses, Samuel, and that John 30 whom you wish to take, I say, not Mary,
query.result: 28 Dari para Serafim, yang paling tinggi kedudukannya, 29 Musa, Samuel, dan Yohanes itu 30 yang ingin kau ambil, kukatakan, bukan Maria,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 non hanno in altro cielo i loro scanni 32 che questi spirti che mo t’appariro, 33 né hanno a l’esser lor più o meno anni;
query.error: **English:** 31 have their seats in no other heaven 32 than these spirits who have just appeared to you, 33 nor do they have more or fewer years in their existence;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 ma tutti fanno bello il primo giro, 35 e differentemente han dolce vita 36 per sentir più e men l’etterno spiro.
query.error: **English:** 34 but all of them beautify the first circle, 35 and they have a sweet life in different ways, 36 because they feel more or less of the eternal breath.
query.result: 34 tetapi semuanya memperindah lingkaran pertama, 35 dan mereka memiliki kehidupan yang manis dengan cara yang berbeda, 36 karena mereka merasakan lebih atau kurang nafas abadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Qui si mostraro, non perché sortita 38 sia questa spera lor, ma per far segno 39 de la celestïal c’ha men salita.
query.error: **English:** 37 Here they showed themselves, not because this sphere is their exit, 38 but to make a sign 39 of the celestial sphere that leads upward.
query.result: 37 Di sini mereka menunjukkan diri, bukan karena bola ini adalah jalan keluar mereka, 38 tetapi untuk membuat tanda 39 dari bola langit yang menuntun ke atas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Così parlar conviensi al vostro ingegno, 41 però che solo da sensato apprende 42 ciò che fa poscia d’intelletto degno.
query.error: **English:** 40 Thus it is fitting to speak to your intellect, 41 because only from a wise person does one learn 42 that which later makes one worthy of understanding.
query.result: 40 Begitulah seharusnya berbicara kepada intelek Anda, 41 karena hanya dari orang bijak seseorang belajar 42 apa yang kemudian membuatnya layak untuk dipahami.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Per questo la Scrittura condescende 44 a vostra facultate, e piedi e mano 45 attribuisce a Dio e altro intende;
query.error: **English:** 43 For this reason, Scripture condescends 44 to your faculty, and attributes 45 feet and hands to God and intends something else;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 e Santa Chiesa con aspetto umano 47 Gabrïel e Michel vi rappresenta, 48 e l’altro che Tobia rifece sano.
query.error: **English:** 46 and Holy Church, with human aspect, 47 represents Gabriel and Michael to you, 48 and the other who made Tobit well again.
query.result: 46 dan Gereja Suci, dengan aspek manusia, 47 menggambarkan Gabriel dan Michael kepada Anda, 48 dan yang lainnya yang membuat Tobit sembuh kembali.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Quel che Timeo de l’anime argomenta 50 non è simile a ciò che qui si vede, 51 però che, come dice, par che senta.
query.error: **English:** 49 What Timaeus argues about the soul 50 is not similar to what is seen here, 51 but, as he says, it seems that it feels.
query.result: 49 Apa yang Timaeus perdebatkan tentang jiwa 50 tidak sama dengan apa yang terlihat di sini, 51 tetapi, seperti yang dikatakannya, tampaknya ia merasakan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Dice che l’alma a la sua stella riede, 53 credendo quella quindi esser decisa 54 quando natura per forma la diede;
query.error: **English:** 52 He says that the soul returns to its star, 53 believing that it was determined there 54 when nature gave it form;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 e forse sua sentenza è d’altra guisa 56 che la voce non suona, ed esser puote 57 con intenzion da non esser derisa.
query.error: **English:** 55 and perhaps its judgment is different 56 than what the voice proclaims, and it may be 57 with an intention not to be mocked.
query.result: 55 dan mungkin keputusannya berbeda 56 daripada apa yang diucapkan oleh suara itu, dan mungkin saja 57 dengan niat untuk tidak diejek.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 S’elli intende tornare a queste ruote 59 l’onor de la influenza e ’l biasmo, forse 60 in alcun vero suo arco percuote.
query.error: **English:** 58 If he intends to return to these wheels, 59 the honor of the influence and the blame, perhaps, 60 he strikes in some true arc of his.
query.result: 58 Jika dia berniat untuk kembali ke roda-roda ini, 59 kehormatan pengaruh dan celaan, mungkin, 60 dia menyerang dalam beberapa lengkungan kebenarannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Questo principio, male inteso, torse 62 già tutto il mondo quasi, sì che Giove, 63 Mercurio e Marte a nominar trascorse.
query.error: **English:** 61 This principle, misunderstood, twisted 62 almost the whole world already, so that Jove, 63 Mercury, and Mars it led astray to name.
query.result: 61 Prinsip ini, yang disalahpahami, telah memutarbalikkan 62 hampir seluruh dunia, sehingga Yupiter, 63 Merkurius, dan Mars disesatkan untuk menyebut nama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 L’altra dubitazion che ti commove 65 ha men velen, però che sua malizia 66 non ti poria menar da me altrove.
query.error: **English:** 64 The other doubt that troubles you 65 has more venom, but its malice 66 could not lead you elsewhere away from me.
query.result: 64 Keraguan lainnya yang mengganggumu 65 memiliki lebih banyak bisa, tetapi kejahatannya 66 tidak dapat membawamu ke tempat lain yang jauh dariku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Parere ingiusta la nostra giustizia 68 ne li occhi d’i mortali, è argomento 69 di fede e non d’eretica nequizia.
query.error: **English:** 67 Our justice seems unjust 68 in the eyes of mortals, it is a matter 69 of faith and not of heretical wickedness.
query.result: 67 Keadilan kita tampak tidak adil 68 di mata manusia, itu adalah masalah 69 keimanan dan bukan kejahatan sesat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Ma perché puote vostro accorgimento 71 ben penetrare a questa veritate, 72 come disiri, ti farò contento.
query.error: **English:** 70 But because your discernment can 71 well penetrate to this truth, 72 as you desire, I will satisfy you.
query.result: 70 Tetapi karena pertimbangan Anda dapat 71 menembus kebenaran ini dengan baik, 72 seperti yang Anda inginkan, saya akan memuaskan Anda.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Se vïolenza è quando quel che pate 74 nïente conferisce a quel che sforza, 75 non fuor quest’ alme per essa scusate:

query.result: 73 Jika kekerasan adalah ketika yang menderita 74 tidak memberikan apa pun kepada yang memaksa, 75 maka jiwa-jiwa ini tidak dimaafkan olehnya:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 ché volontà, se non vuol, non s’ammorza, 77 ma fa come natura face in foco, 78 se mille volte vïolenza il torza.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 non è l’affezion mia tanto profonda, 122 che basti a render voi grazia per grazia; 123 ma quei che vede e puote a ciò risponda.
query.error: **English:** 121 my affection is not so profound 122 that it suffices to render you grace for grace; 123 but may He who sees and can do so respond to this."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Io veggio ben che già mai non si sazia 125 nostro intelletto, se ’l ver non lo illustra 126 di fuor dal qual nessun vero si spazia.
query.error: **English:** 124 I see well that our intellect is never satisfied 125 unless the truth enlightens it, 126 outside of which no true knowledge can be found.
query.result: 124 Aku melihat dengan jelas bahwa intelek kita tidak pernah puas 125 kecuali kebenaran meneranginya, 126 di luar kebenaran itu tidak ada pengetahuan sejati yang dapat ditemukan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Posasi in esso, come fera in lustra, 128 tosto che giunto l’ha; e giugner puollo: 129 se non, ciascun disio sarebbe frustra.
query.error: **English:** 127 He places himself in it, like a wild beast in its lair, 128 as soon as he has arrived there; and he can arrive there: 129 if not, every desire would be frustrated.
query.result: 127 Dia meletakkan dirinya di dalamnya, seperti binatang buas di sarangnya, 128 segera setelah dia sampai di sana; dan dia bisa sampai di sana: 129 jika tidak, setiap keinginan akan sia-sia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Nasce per quello, a guisa di rampollo, 131 a piè del vero il dubbio; ed è natura 132 ch’al sommo pinge noi di collo in collo.
query.error: **English:** 130 Doubt is born from that, like a new shoot, 131 at the foot of truth; and it is nature's way 132 that it leads us to the summit, step by step.
query.result: 130 Keraguan lahir dari itu, seperti tunas baru, 131 di kaki kebenaran; dan itu adalah cara alam 132 yang menuntun kita ke puncak, selangkah demi selangkah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Questo m’invita, questo m’assicura 134 con reverenza, donna, a dimandarvi 135 d’un’altra verità che m’è oscura.
query.error: **English:** 133 This invites me, this assures me 134 with reverence, lady, to ask you 135 about another truth that is obscure to me.
query.result: 133 Ini mengundangku, ini meyakinkanku 134 dengan hormat, nona, untuk menanyakanmu 135 tentang kebenaran lain yang tidak jelas bagiku.

query.prompt:
